Body:
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.ThorLabsAPT, [ThorLabsPacket(message_id=
    ThorLabsCommands.HW_REQ_INFO, param1=0, param2=0, dest=80, source=1,
    data=None).pack()], [ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.
    HW_GET_INFO, dest=1, source=80, data=hw_info_data.pack(
    b'\x01\x02\x03\x04', 'ABC-123'.encode('ascii'), 3, 161, 162, 163,
    'abcdefg'.encode('ascii'), 42, 43, 2)).pack()], sep='') as apt:
    assert apt._hw_type == 'Unknown type: 3'
    assert apt._fw_version == 'a1.a2.a3'
    assert apt._notes == 'abcdefg'
    assert apt._hw_version == 42
    assert apt._mod_state == 43
    assert apt.serial_number == '01020304'
    assert apt.model_number == 'ABC-123'
    assert apt.name == 'ThorLabs APT Instrument model ABC-123, serial 01020304 (HW version 42, FW version a1.a2.a3)'
